DOC_DESCRIPTION.message: Create documents, spreadsheets and presentations that you can work on online and offline.

DOCS_SECTION_GROUP_DESCRIPTION.message: Click ‘Share’, invite people and work together in real time. It’s that easy.

DOCS_SECTION_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION.message: With automatic backups to Google Drive, you never have to worry about losing your work again.

DOCS_SECTION_ANYWHERE_DESCRIPTION.message: Your work is stored safely in Google Drive so you can access it from any computer, tablet or smartphone.

DOCS_HINT_TITLE.message: What if I use Microsoft Office?

DOCS_HINT_DESCRIPTION.message: Google Docs is built-in to every Chromebook for free. Chromebooks also work with Microsoft<sup>®</sup> Office documents so you can edit Word and Excel files even when you’re offline.

DOCS_BALLOON_SHARE.message: Work with others in real time, insert comments and track changes using revision history

DOCS_BALLOON_MENU.message: Print, export, share and manage your documents in the cloud

DOCS_BALLOON_TOOLBAR.message: Create tables, justify text and change font colors to your heart’s content
